abstract: 'Everywhere I go in the world, I always end up on the west side.'
description: From Russia to Werribee, via the gangs of Los Angeles and Las Vegas, Dmitry Schukin's story is one of redemption through art. He talks openly about the crimes of his past and the pursuits that have helped him channel all the negative into something positive and given Schukin something to fight for.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002321; Western stories : expressions for the future; Active; 2010
